verses.text: \w He|strong="H0157"\w* that loveth \w correction|strong="H4148"\w*, loveth \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*: but \w he|strong="H0157"\w* that hateth \w reproof|strong="H8433"\w* \w is|strong="H1847"\w* foolish.

\w The|strong="H3045"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w* regardeth \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w lives|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w his|strong="H3045"\w* \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w*: \w but|strong="H7563"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* bowels \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w are|strong="H7563"\w* \w cruel|strong="H0394"\w*.

\w A|strong="H3117"\w* \w fool|strong="H0191"\w* immediately sheweth \w his|strong="H3045"\w* anger: \w but|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* dissembleth injuries \w is|strong="H3117"\w* wise.

He \w that|strong="H5046"\w* speaketh \w that|strong="H5046"\w* which he knoweth, sheweth forth \w justice|strong="H6664"\w*: but he \w that|strong="H5046"\w* lieth, \w is|strong="H6664"\w* \w a|strong="H5046"\w* \w deceitful|strong="H4820"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3808"\w* \w deceitful|strong="H7423"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* find gain: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w substance|strong="H1952"\w* \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3808"\w* just \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w precious|strong="H3368"\w* \w gold|strong="H2742"\w*.
